feature.label: RhoStudio
feature.description: Use RhoStudio-beta1 to: - Generate Rhodes applications - Generate Rhodes Models and associated Controllers and View templates - Manage build configuration (build.yml and rhobuild.yml) using Eclipse UI - Build and run on Rhodes application on iPhone, Android, Windows Mobile, and BlackBerry simulators and devices - See build and application execution logs in Eclipse output console
